name: CDS
description: County/District/School code

name: RTYPE
description: Record Type: D=District, S=School, X=State

name: STYPE
description:
Type: 1=Unified, 2=Elementary District, 
                    3=9-12 High District, 4=7-12 High District, E=Elementary School, 
                    M=Middle School, H=High School

name: SPED
description: A=Alternative Schools Accountability Model (ASAM), E=Special Education, and C=Combination ASAM and Special Education

name: SIZE
description: S=Small (11-99 Valid API Scores), T=Under 11 Valid API Scores

name: CHARTER
description: Y=Charter, Not Direct Funded, D=Direct Funded Charter, Blank=Not a Charter School

name: SNAME
description: School Name

name: DNAME
description: District Name

name: CNAME
description: County Name

name: FLAG
description: Flag Values

name: VALID
description:
Number of Scores included in the 2006 


Academic Performance Index (API)

name: API06
description: 2006 API (Growth)

name: API05
description:
2005 API (Base),"B," "C," (B=School did 
                    not have a valid 2005 API Base and there is no Growth or target 
                    information,C=School had significant demographic changes and 
                    there is no Growth or target information )

name: TARGET
description:
2005–2006 Growth Target, "A," "B," "C," "D," or 
                    "E". (A=Met Interim Performance Target 
                    of 800. B= School did 
                    not have a valid 2005 API Base and there is no Growth or target 
                    information. C=School had significant demographic changes and 
                    there is no Growth or target information D=There is no growth 
                    target for Districts and ASAM schools E= School was an Alternative 
                    Schools Accountability Model (ASAM) school in the API Base 
                    report and has no target information even though the school 
                    is no longer an ASAM school).

name: GROWTH
description:
2005–2006 API Growth,"B," "C," (B=School did 
                    not have a valid 2005 API Base and there is no Growth or target 
                    information,C=School had significant demographic changes and 
                  there is no Growth or target information.)

name: SCH_WIDE
description: Met School-wide Growth Target

name: COMP_IMP
description:
Met Comparable Improvement (CI) 
                    Target

name: BOTH
description: Met both School-wide/CI Target
